text: Agnieszka Kotulanka, rightly Agnieszka Sas-Uhrynowska (born Agniesza Kotuła; 26 October 1956 – 20 February 2018) was a Polish actress and a performer of actress songs. She was known for long-term appearance as Krystyna Lubicz in Polish soap opera Klan (1997-2013). She also appeared as Karska in the 1995 movie Holy Week directed by Andrzej Wajda. Kotulanka died due to dipsomania in Warsaw on 20 February 2018 at the age of 61.Nie żyje Agnieszka Kotulanka. Aktorka miała 61 lat. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Drug-related deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:People from Warsaw
